Bash(git -C /Users/antialias/projects/soroban-abacus-flashcards commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
fix: remove fiber traversal from e2e, move mismatch timer server-side

Replace React fiber tree traversal in debug-practice e2e test with a
data-correct-answer attribute on VerticalProblem. Move CLEAR_MISMATCH
timer from client useEffect to server-side socket handler to fix
WebSocket race conditions on multi-replica k3s deployments.

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.6 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git -C /Users/antialias/projects/soroban-abacus-flashcards commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
fix: exclude src/test from tsconfig to fix Docker build

The src/test/journey-simulator/EphemeralDatabase.ts imports better-sqlite3
which is a devDependency not available in the Docker production build.
Excluding src/test from tsconfig prevents Next.js type checking from
failing on test-only files. Vitest uses its own resolution and still
finds these files.

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.6 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(/tmp/final_analysis.sh << 'ANALYZEEOF'
#!/bin/bash

# Categorize by testability and importance

echo "FINAL COMPREHENSIVE ANALYSIS"
echo "============================"
echo ""

# Count totals
total_utils=$\(find /Users/antialias/projects/soroban-abacus-flashcards/apps/web/src/utils -maxdepth 1 -name "*.ts" -o -name "*.tsx" | wc -l\)
total_lib=$\(find /Users/antialias/projects/soroban-abacus-flashcards/apps/web/src/lib -maxdepth 1 -name "*.ts" | wc -l\)
total_hooks=$\(find /Users/antialias/projects/soroban-abacus-flashcards/apps/web/src/hooks -name "use*.ts" -o -name "use*.tsx" | wc -l\)
total_contexts=$\(find /Users/antialias/projects/soroban-abacus-flashcards/apps/web/src/contexts -name "*.tsx" ! -name "*.mock.tsx" ! -name "index.tsx" | wc -l\)

echo "COVERAGE SUMMARY"
echo "================"
echo "Utils files: $total_utils total, ~3 without tests"
echo "Lib files: $total_lib total at root level, ~9 without tests"  
echo "Hooks: $total_hooks total, ~51 without tests"
echo "Contexts: $total_contexts total, ~1 without tests"

ANALYZEEOF)
